name: The Empire State
startIntroPart1: War efforts provides purpose... and entertainment. War is Peace.
declaringWar: No hard feelings, this is all in the name of entertainment.
attacked: My loyal Strike Commander...  You are going to save many lives today.
defeated: My loyal Strike Commander...  You have failed your duty to protect the State.
introduction: The Empire State welcomes you, for now.
tradeRequest: We have an offer, do you accept?

name: The Krux Rebellion
startIntroPart1: The world must know, the heinous crimes of the Fuhrer Adler Grimm.
declaringWar: For the sake of humanity... May the best general win... All cannons, REDCON 1!
attacked: You have finally decided to attack us... DO YOUR WORST!!!
defeated: You may have defeated me - but the Krux Rebellion will live on & will one day strike once more...
introduction: Get in my way & I shall destroy you too!
tradeRequest: I believe this offer of mine will mutually benefit us, what do you say?
